Press Releases.Title: 884 New Cases of Covid-19 Infection
Press Releases.MainContent:
As of 12 May 2020, 12pm, the Ministry of Health (MOH) has preliminarily confirmed an additional 884 cases of COVID-19 infection in Singapore, the vast majority of whom are Work Permit holders residing in foreign worker dormitories. Three cases are Singaporeans/ Permanent Residents.

2.     We are still working through the details of the cases, and further updates will be shared via the MOH press release that will be issued tonight.

MINISTRY OF HEALTH
12 MAY 2020
